record.title: LETTER OF RESIGNATION

speaking.paragraph: I understand the Chair has an announcement.

record.chair: The Chair lays before the Senate the letter of resignation of Senator TRENT LOTT of Mississippi.
Without objection, the letter is deemed read and spread upon the journal.

DEAR MR. PRESIDENT: I hereby give notice of my retirement from the Office of United States Senator from the State of Mississippi. Therefore, I tender my resignation effective at 11:30 p.m., December 18, 2007.
